title: I accidentally disenchanted a skin
body: I accidentally disenchanted a skin from loot, is there any chance i can get it back?

replies.body:
Unfortunately once an action is taken in Hextech Crafting, it cannot be undone. I know how exciting it can be when you get **epic loot** and you're excited to unlock it and hop into a match to check it out. I recommend taking it slow, reading the action you're going to select and ensure it's the action you want to take with that content.

Let me know if you have any questions.
